```{r}
library(tidyverse)

```

```{r}
# Exercise 2

df_hg19 <- read_tsv(
  "hg19-kc-count.bed",
  col_names = c("chr", "start", "end", "count")
)
df_hg16 <- read_tsv(
  "hg16-kc-count.bed",
  col_names = c("chr", "start", "end", "count")
)

df_combined <- bind_rows(
  df_hg19,
  df_hg16,
  .id = "assembly"
)

exercise_2_plot <- df_combined %>% 
  # assembly 1 is hg19
  # assembly 2 is hg16
  ggplot(aes(x = start, y = count, color = assembly)) +
  geom_line() +
  facet_wrap(. ~ chr, scales = "free") 
ggsave("exercise2.png", exercise_2_plot, scale = 2)
```
